headline: The Wight of Wings and Poppies
description: A shard-like meditation of memory and burden. The weight of wings carries fragile poppies—symbols of death, beauty, and remembrance. This piece belongs to the phase Candle Adrift, where light persists upon uncertain waters.
keywords: The Wight of Wings and Poppies

motifMap.meaning: burdened spirit, the heavy possibility of flight
memory, sacrifice, fragile beauty in grief
spirit-being, both ghost and weight of existence

associatedMedia.description: A black-and-white image of a dark wing, heavy with form, carrying bright red poppies. Symbol of remembrance, burden, and ghostly presence.
